::Autofire::

Somewhere in southern Africa, over a ravine which had been partially covered 
by an avalance in the past, the sky darkens. Lightning bolts shoot out of the 
sky, where moments before there were harmless white clouds. One of the bolts 
hits the rocks, sending them flying everywhere. The remaining pile of rocks 
begins to shake, seconds later an arm smashing through it.

"I LIVE!!!" the ex-Autobot known as Autofire yells, a second hand smashing 
through the rocks, the rest of them falling away. The bot stands up, looking 
at the stormy sky.

'How nice of you to notice.'

Autofire spins around as he hears the voice in his head, trying to find the 
source.

'Don't bother,' it says again, 'You cannot see me.'

"Wh-who are you?" Autofire asks, his voice unsure.

'I am a Vok,' the voice replies, 'I have brought you back, to keep the 
timeline intact.'

Autofire looks down at himself, frowning at his new body.

'That's right,' the voice says, 'You are now a Predacon. You are here to 
ensure that the Maximals don't bring bots back to Cybertron.'

"And what if I don-AAAAAAHHH!!!!!"

Pain goes through Autofire before the bot finishes his sentence, sending him 
down to his knees. 'That.'

Autofire growls, "Allright."

The Predacon turns his head as he sees another hand emerge from the rocks 
near him.

'Your partner, Adrax,' the voice sounds in his head, Autofire frowning.

(Take it from here, JP)
